Name: Increase Fuel Tank Capacity
column7: Local.FuelType = Engine.EngineName := 'Sail*' 'Electric*' 'Methane*' 'Gasoline*' 'Diesel*' 'Jet Propeller*' 'Turbine*';Cost += Level * Local.FuelType : 0 2 2 2 2 1 1;Fuel += Level * Local.FuelType : 0 5 5 1 1 10 10;CFUsed += Level * Local.FuelType : 0 0 0.5 0.02 0.02 0.2 0.2

Name: Signature Improvement
column7: Cost += Level ^ 4 * 200; Sig += Level; Security = Security >> Level : 0 1 0; Military = Military >> Level : 0 0 1
